heading: Wednesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, with a trace to 2 inches. Lows from the upper teens to mid 20s, some mid teens northeast. South winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly sunny southeast, otherwise partly to mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers; an afternoon squall also possible, mainly north. Highs from the upper 20s to mid 30s, mid to upper 30s southeast. Southwest winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Mainly clear south. Variable clouds north, with the chance of a snow shower. Lows in the low to mid teens. Southwest winds gusting to 30 mph early, then diminishing and becoming west.
